title: 4Geeks
description:
4Geeks.com is where you come to learn new tech skills and land the tech job you dream about. We focus on providing the tools, community, and environment that dramatically increases your odds of achieving technical proficiency in Python, Javascript, Data Science, Machine Learning, Cybersecurity, and other coding-related skills.

Rigobot is our internal AI mentor. It knows who you are and how you feel and sees your screen to provide real-time feedback! You will never be stuck again.
